product_name: VP Components VX Race Pedals - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Built to let you spin at race pace with ease, the SPD-compatible VX Race pedals will see you through long rides or fast-paced workouts with minimal weight and efficient design.
short_description: Built to let you spin at race pace with ease, the SPD-compatible VX Race pedals will see you through long rides or fast-paced workouts with minimal weight and efficient design.
